title: runtime: unknown argument frame size for *, invalid stack (ARM)
body:
by **capnm9**: 
uname -a
Linux rpi 3.6.11+ #474 PREEMPT Thu Jun 13 17:14:42 BST 2013 armv6l GNU/Linux
hg id
ef3ed5705640 tip


Works: amd64, arm go-1.1.1
Broken: arm tip


The example requires a running x11:
https://github.com/BurntSushi/xgb/blob/master/examples/atoms/main.go

go get github.com/BurntSushi/xgb
cd src/github.com/BurntSushi/xgb/examples/atoms
go build -v
  github.com/BurntSushi/xgb
  github.com/BurntSushi/xgb/xproto
  github.com/BurntSushi/xgb/examples/atoms

./atoms
runtime: unknown argument frame size for runtime.chansend1
fatal error: invalid stack

goroutine 0 [idle]:
runtime.throw(0x281e1b)
	/d/go/src/pkg/runtime/panic.c:480 +0x54
runtime.gentraceback(0x1c30c, 0xb6dd353c, 0x38050, 0x105010a0, 0x0, ...)
	/d/go/src/pkg/runtime/traceback_arm.c:101 +0x754
runtime.sigprof(0x1c30c, 0xb6dd353c, 0x38050, 0x105010a0)
	/d/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:1851 +0xd8
runtime.sighandler(0x1b, 0x10803c90, 0x10803d10, 0x105010a0)
	/d/go/src/pkg/runtime/signal_arm.c:50 +0x74
runtime: unknown argument frame size for runtime.sigtramp
runtime.sigtramp()
	/d/go/src/pkg/runtime/sys_linux_arm.s:313 +0x44
runtime: unknown argument frame size for runtime.sigreturn
runtime.sigreturn()
	/d/go/src/pkg/runtime/sys_linux_arm.s:339

goroutine 1 [running]:
Segmentation fault
